Commands.Steelguard: Raises BRV by 3/4 of Snow's Initial BRV and grants him BRV Damage Reduction for 5 turns.  Provokes the target for 5 turns.
Commands.Froststrike: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  10% of HP damage dealt is converted to BRV.

Passives.HP Damage Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack after taking HP damage.
Passives.Steelguard Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Steelguard.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Steelguard BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using Steelguard.
Passives.Froststrike Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Froststrike.
Passives.Froststrike Charge: Increases the max uses of Froststrike by 1.
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when attacking an enemy targeting self.
Passives.Indomitable Will: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Steelguard Extend: Turns Steelguard's Provoke effect to an AoE.Moderately raises the BRV Gain based on Initial BRV.Slightly raises the potency of the BRV Damage Reduction shield.Grants BRV Regen for 10 turns.
Passives.BRV Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV when HP is over 50%.
Passives.Froststrike Extend: Slightly raises the potency of Froststrike.Slightly raises BRV recovered after using the skill.Grants HP recovery based on 20% of inflicted damage.

Weapons.Feral Pride CP: 35: Increases the potency of Froststrike and raises the BRV gain when HP damage is inflicted.
Weapons.Wild Bear CP: 15: Raises the BRV gain of Steelguard and extends the duration of its effects.
